long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We are glad to welcome you! 
In this app you can play Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3 right in the Braiser without internet. 
Choose your favorite character and start your journey to the top of fame!
